short_desc: Clinical assessment, individual, family and school-based counseling, day and residential treatment for special education children and youth, age 6-21
description: Provides assessment and certification for special education children and youth up to age 22, to establish eligibility for educationally - related mental health services in Alameda County. Services provided to eligible children and youth include clinical assessment, outpatient individual and family therapy, school-based counseling, day treatment, residential treatment and case management. A referral from the school district is required to apply for service.
